block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Learn how to fold an Origami Peace Dove design by Alice Gray in this video. Less than a minute origami. Enjoy!!! Thanks for watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art

meta_description: Heap Art Origami tutorial, How to fold Peace Dove by Alice Gray
